1377850.name: Server is Down
1377850.description:
Welcome to Server is Down, psychological horror game in which s̴̨̧̡̜̜̯̦͍̠̬͚͎͎̈́̐͑̑̎́͑́͂̌́͊̆̈́̍̀̋̾̒̑̓̚͜͝ơ̴̧̧̛̟̱̫̫͕͚̘̗͓͎̠̠̤̼̭̼̭̊̎̏̎̏͗̾͋͗̂̏̅͛͒͋̅̿͗̿͛̉͑̈̐͑̾̀̆͌́͗̀͆̐̑̍͐̀̉̒̃̉̀͂̚̕͘͜͝͠͝m̶̧̛̛̜͙̟̜͙̖̯̝̙̗͚̥̈́͊͒͑̈͌͌̈́͒̃̄͒̊̿̽̅̏̌̾̊͐͐̑̈́̉͂͌̍̇̿͂́̽̋̃́͑̇͑͒̇͐̄̒̍̉̄͌͒̆̕̕̕̚͜͝͝ȩ̵̨͔͓̝͙̦̺̩̰̮̖̼̭̯̥͓̥̯͉͌̑͋́̽̃͗̒̇̋̋̃̕̕͜͜͜t̵͓̥̥̻̳̪̬͎̖͈̺̺͇̣͕̯̹͈̟̟̳̫̣̯̖̭̤͍̣͚̩̺̝̘͕̪͇͔̺͙̜̗̜̞̰͐̅̽͊́͛͗̓͛͊͛̒̉̀͌̑̌̂̕͝ḧ̵̨̢̜̟͍̪̩͚͈̟̮̦̺̳͖̭̖̮̬̙̩̼̙̤̼̘͈̪͚͓̩̩͍̖̟̠̗̣͓̪͎̲͇̘̺͇́̏́̉̅͜ͅi̶̢̛͚̳͔̻̥͈̮͙̭͓͇̥̫͙̗̬̳̲̥̹̟̳͙̙̫̟̘̬̣̖̞̺̰̮͇̤̜͔̗͔̮̻̦̯̗̘̟̳͕͋̃̍̊̿̎̇̑͆̿̅̈̂͊̄͌̿͊̆̈͗͑͐͑͋̐̈́̈́̈́̐̇͛̍̃͑̚̕͘̚͝͝ņ̶̢̢̧̨̩̩̩̯̹̬̜̦̱̼̘͍͕̠̮̻̰̹̝̩̘̣̺͎̺̮̹̝͍̪̘̜͔̘̈̉̈́̿̿̑͒̈́̿̐̅̇̊̒͠ͅͅġ̵̡̨̼̥͕̗̜͎̝͙̖͕̦̝̜͔̳͖̦͈̟̟̳̥̯͔͔̟̟̘͙͚̤̗̩͚͚̝͚̽̔͌̆̊̅̊͐͌̈͐̇͆̍́̌̅̃̏̀̅̏̚̚͘̚͝͝ breaks the server which you are trying to fix on an old computer. You and other friends with whom you chat are trying to figure out the problem, but you all appear to be on a sinking ship.

!E̸R̵R̶O̸R̸ ̵l̴o̴a̷d̵i̸n̴g̷ ̶d̸e̵s̸c̶r̶i̵p̸t̷i̶o̸n̵!

((Manual's Warning: Game contains imagery that may be harmful to players with photosensitive epilepsy or similar condition.))

Features:


  • Learn new ways and commands to fix broken server

  • Giant manual on 300+ pages for no reason!

  • Share your feelings with chat friends

  • Use old pc and CRT monitor to access server

  • At least 1 deer!l


This game is not suitable for children
or those who are easily disturbed.
1377850.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
